amendment.description: Page 36, line 25, strike "and". Page 37, line 7, strike the period and insert "; and". Page 37, after line 7, insert the following: "(C) seek to appoint individuals involved in the industries affected by the Bureau, including individuals who represent community banks, credit unions, small business owners, or experts in United States economic growth and jobs.".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in Part A of House Report 116-79 to ensure that the Consumer Advisory Board is comprised of individuals who represent community banks, credit unions, small business owners, or economic growth experts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stevens amendment (A014) Agreed to by recorded vote: 418 - 10 (Roll no. 225).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A014) offered by Ms. Stevens.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Stevens amendment (A014) Agreed to by recorded vote: 418 - 10 (Roll no. 225).
